TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable/HtmlTableRowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects that are the rows of an control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> objects for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control. Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method. Only controls of type <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> collection.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] -->
[!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed

Docs.param: The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection> collection that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. Notice how the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.Add%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method with the `index` parameter equal to 0.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] -->

Docs.exception: The added control must be of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void AddAt (int index, System.Web.UI.Control child);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void AddAt(int32 index, class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed

Docs.param: The location in the array at which to add the child control.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the collection. The new control is added to the array at the specified index location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.

Docs.exception: The added control must be of type .
